competitors.name: Cadence Design Systems
competitors.notes: Primary competitor with 36% market share (vs. Synopsys's 38%), controlling 74% of EDA market together

competitors.name: Mentor Graphics
competitors.notes: Part of the 'Big Three' oligopoly, later acquired by Siemens in 2017

context: By 2015, the EDA market had solidified into a 'Big Three' oligopoly. The market was characterized by extreme stability due to each vendor being dominant in different EDA product categories with 'golden signoff' tools considered de facto standards by major foundries.
